<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 2+"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Bravo's Brew](/Equipment.aspx?ID=3300)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Alchemical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=528" />
<trait label="Consumable" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=564" />
<trait label="Elixir" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=589" />
<trait label="Mental" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=647" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** L
</row>

<row gap="medium">
<row gap="tiny"><row>**Activate**</row><actions string="Single Action" /><row>([manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104))</row></row>

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

This flask of foaming beer grants courage. For the next hour after drinking this elixir, you gain an item bonus to Will saves, which is greater when attempting Will saves against [fear](/Traits.aspx?ID=598).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>

<title
level="2"
right="Item 2"
pfs="Standard"
>
Bravo's Brew (Lesser)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 7 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus on Will saves is +1, or +2 against fear.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 10"
pfs="Standard"
>
Bravo's Brew (Moderate)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 150 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus on Will saves is +2, or +3 against fear.

<title
level="2"
right="Item 15"
pfs="Standard"
>
Bravo's Brew (Greater)
</title>

<traits>

</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Player Core 2](/Sources.aspx?ID=227) pg. 286 <sup>1.1</sup>, [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 547 <sup>4.0</sup>, [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 246 <sup>2.0</sup>

**Price** 700 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Bulk** L

</row>

</column>

---

The bonus on Will saves is +3, or +4 against fear. If you roll a success on a save against fear, you get a critical success instead.
